text: is there a way we could hit the search url with a term that would show all the items that the search has cached?
something like `<https://api.hubapi.com/contentsearch/v2/search?portalId=0000000&showAll=true>` this way you can get a full page listing on a site including dynamic pages
I could set this up with Auth
So you will need a hapikey to access
that would be awesome, i was trying to hit the <http://hs-sites.com|hs-sites.com> site with screaming frog (even with the ignore robots file) and it wasnt pulling anything
Can you send me the site?
